data.text:
RT @flb_xyz: 30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurr…

30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurr_app

- Visit https://t.co/3pKPLI019u and connect your wallet
- Create your account by signing a transaction and then register the account
- Visit the Wrap tab and wrap some of your HYPE
- Go to Trade and approve WHYPE spending
- Place some Up/Down or Above/Below bets with specified time intervals

Let's see if I can trade profitably lmao

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 20

This issue will cover OctoSwap, another DEX building on Monad

- Visit https://t.co/rhtLbHfNgL and connect your wallet
- Swap some tokens (I recommend getting some OCTO)
- Go to the liquidity tab and supply liquidity for one of the available pairs

Pretty simple interactions today, but the team is working on building out a Profile section with referrals as well as some games

For anyone that deposited in the Berachain x Concrete vaults you can now claim your funds

Check the quote-tweeted thread and scroll through for the different claim links (Lombard, Ethena, Dinero)

As you probably already know the yield was dust so time to find a new place to deploy funds, there are a ton of options

The Doodles airdrop checker is live: https://t.co/VMAALqJWyd

This is pretty much straight dust for me and comes off as another way to extract from the Doodles image

I remember seeing the announcement of $DOOD but haven't seen anything regarding utility since

Insta-jeet for me https://t.co/Un58b90BOE

Make sure to turn your notifications on for posts by Fogo

Fogo's custom X leaderboard is based on your engagement with posts from their account

If you comment and engage earlier, you have higher odds of better responses/impressions/etc

I am currently trying to get more active

Nahhh, I just got cooked by Succinct

1.44x multiplier on 100+ stars

Depressing roadblock on my Succinct stars journey but we keep it pushing

What's the lowest multiplier you've gotten? Is it possible to get 1.00? https://t.co/xL6QJUpQIy

Skate just dropped their eligibility checker for their Kaito leaderboard Ollie rewards

- Visit https://t.co/2li73KnLTS and connect your X
- Select Leaderboard Rewards to see if you are eligible

Unfortunately, I was not eligible this time but as someone who is a big fan of interoperability and chain abstraction, I do want to get more involved with Skate

The team just dropped a 1,000 slots for the beta today but unfortunately I saw it too late :/

It's crazy how unserious blockchains can be lmao

Succinct's Blinky drank too much lean and is now disabled until Stage 2

With multiple games now disabled it seems we are getting closer and closer to a Succinct update

Does anyone know why certain games get disabled first? https://t.co/2R0bCzOxPd

Although I don't enjoy doing a long list of social tasks, I have decided to complete the Camp Network quests as it has its own ecosystem hub with custom points (Acorns + Matchsticks)

I'd be surprised if these were treated just as Galxe or Intract points

Get started:

- Visit https://t.co/aIcbfj73uq
- Connect your wallet, fill in profile details, and connect socials
- Start completing tasks to rack up your acorns
- Revisit daily to claim your daily check-in

Let's see together what kind of IP blockchain Camp manages to build

I have a sneaking suspicion that Infinex is not very used and people only yap about the project

THUS

The real way forward is the 2-in-1: yapping about your on chain contributions

I'm starting to do interactions on Infinex each week (aiming to do new chains and ~$10k volume) https://t.co/K0zznK1wzw

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 21

Today we will be interacting with another popular DEX on the Monad testnet, @bebop_dex

- Visit https://t.co/pH3WzkKGgG and connect your wallet
- Swap some MON for USDC
- Go to Send and send a tiny amount to someone random

Done. What protocol do you want next?

RT @flb_xyz: 30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 21

Today we will be interacting with another popular DEX on the Monad testnet, @bebop_dex

- Vi…

30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 21

Today we are diving into The Farm, one of the only games currently live on HyperEVM

- Visit https://t.co/PxtPrvTznr and connect your wallet
- Choose a map
- Select Fish and start fishing
- Continue playing the game and exploring the map

I hope to see more games in development on the network

RT @flb_xyz: 30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 21

Today we are diving into The Farm, one of the only games currently live on HyperEVM

- Visit http…

Paradex has Kaito rewards

I didn't realise that Paradex actually gives out XP rewards for the top Kaito yappers

I wrote a few posts and it turns out I earned an XP distribution that heavily outweighs the trading/liquidity efforts needed for the same amount

This seems to be pretty unkown and definitely presents an opportunity for smaller accounts

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 22

Today we are exploring a community building protocol on the Monad testnet: @TalentumID

- Visit https://t.co/N7ffEJNkP9 and connect your wallet
- Set your username and join the Molandak Hub
- Complete daily MON streak in the top right
- Connect social accounts in the left side bar
- Go to Explore and join different projects
- Start completing tasks
- You can use reward credits to purchase packs in the Marketplace

30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 22

For this edition, let's explore a DEX aggregator and DeFi tool built on HyperEVM, LiquidSwap (a product from LiquidLaunch)

- Visit https://t.co/cXQ2mNKMq1 and connect your wallet
- Swap some HYPE for another token such as UBTC or LIQD
- Go to More --> Revoke and revoke any unlimited approvals

Tomorrow we will dive into the core product from @LiquidLaunchHL: the token launcher

Here is a rare Camp Network interaction to do ($30m funding)

<4,000 users have completed

- Visit https://t.co/Ckgj76xz17 and connect your wallet
- Select "+" to create a story
- Go to https://t.co/HlyDz68dwM and submit your wallet address (it should come up as True)
- Go to https://t.co/7YTpTCdzkY and verify the tasks to earn Matchsticks (there are a few social tasks too)

I will post updates on other Camp quests in the coming days, make sure to follow me if you want to keep up!

New @moremarketsxyz Alpha

Reminder that the project has $13m in funding

<300 users have done this 1 minute task

Steps:
- Make sure you have joined the Discord, you can find it in their bio if you need it
- Visit the great-vault channel and send the 'More' message
- This will unlock a new channel where you can claim the Yield Guardian role (only ~250 claimed when I did it earlier)

I really enjoy this new Twitter update

Some notifications now get hidden based on a credibility score for an account (my crypto mind immediately thinks of @ethos_network)

This is great as whenever you get tagged in a spam post with spam replies it can get really annoying in your notifications

Considering my account is crypto related I probably get more than average too...

I'd be curious to know more about the formula for credibility as it likely ties into your algorithm and how much your posts get pushed as well

I just sold my $DOOD airdrop, as everyone should in my opinion

Now the real question is what should I buy with my $12?

(also if you ever use Jupiter, don't. Use Jumper for the 2-in-1 interaction or use Titan instead of Jupiter) https://t.co/My3fnKOI4G

Humanity Protocol ($30m funding) is finally back

For a long time the RPC was inactive and there was no way of interacting with Humanity, this has changed with the launch of a new testnet beta

- Visit https://t.co/mHYa0hcchW and connect your wallet
- Link your social accounts (+10% for each account)
- Click Faucet and claim tHP tokens
- Claim your daily HP rewards

Mitosis + Morph

$32m total funding, <$300k TVL

Here is a great 2-in-1 opportunity if you are farming Mitosis and want some additional exposure

Morph is a L2 that's heavily underfarmed with $25m funding. I'm ranked top 10k in Morph points although I've only pushed a handful of transactions (last one being a couple months ago)

To get started:
- Make sure your wallet is signed up for Morph points:
https://t.co/NNIiIPdFwm
- Visit https://t.co/Cz4i01umkS and connect your wallet
- Deposit stables or WETH/WBTC to receive maWETH (if you need to bridge to Morph you can use Relay)

Although the low TVL shows that some might be tired of new Mitosis campaigns, I think opportunities that are so heavily underused are worth putting at least a couple dollars towards (I also recommend the Theo vault)

Are you interacting with Mira/Klok?

Mira raised $10m and is responsible for building Klok. You can now claim a FREE 500 points just for connecting an email

- Visit https://t.co/a87L2HQcOj and connect your wallet
- There will be a popup offering the 500 points
- Make sure to use your 10 daily prompts as well to earn an additional 100 points a day

Also I would recommend changing up the model you use as that displays a more organic use and exploration of the protocol
